About me

SKILLS

Angularjs
Javascript
C# .Net, ASP.Net and .Net Core
Windows Form
MS SQL

   Hello, I'm Jason Gange, a .Net Developer. I also have knowledge in using Angularjs and Javascript. I graduated from Pamantasan Ng Lungsod Ng Marikina way back 2017. It was a rough and challenging experience for me to finish my course to become Web developer. While studying I worked as a Service Crew at Jollibee to support my allowance and juggling my time at the same time as a varsity player in our University.
   I landed my first job in IT industry as a Technical Support. My urge to pursue programming was started when I got inspired by my cousin's husband who is a well-known inspirational motivator for newbie programmers in IT industry. Currently, I'm working as a Fullstack Web Developer at Codebizz IT Solution for more than 1 year and handled various projects from different clients.
   I believe that programming is a continuous learning. If you want to achieve more in this field, passion, time and patience must put all together to succeed.

Codebizz IT Solutions
